00027         public void createPrintRun(object sender, EventArgs e)
00028         {
00029             IPrintRunRepository prRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IPrintRunRepository>();
00030             PrintRun newRun;
00031 
00032             if (validateFields())
00033             {
00034 
00035                 newRun = new PrintRun();
00036                 newRun.height = Int32.Parse(runHeight.Text);
00037                 newRun.width = Int32.Parse(runWidth.Text);
00038                 newRun.quantity = Int32.Parse(runQuantity.Text);
00039                 newRun.stock_finish = runFinish.SelectedValue;
00040                 newRun.stock_weight = runWeight.SelectedValue;
00041                 newRun.run_name = runName.Text;
00042 
00043                 prRepo.AddPrintRun(newRun);
00044                 prRepo.SubmitChanges();
00045 
00046                 notifyMsg.Text = "Print Run Created Sucessfully";
00047                 notifyMsg.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Green;
00048                 notifyMsg.Visible = true;
00049 
00050             }
00051            
00052 
00053         }
00054 
00055         private bool validateFields()
00056         {
00057            
00058             //validate form fields
00059             if (runName.Text.Trim().Equals("") || runFinish.SelectedValue.Trim().Equals("") ||
00060                 runWeight.SelectedValue.Trim().Equals("") ||
00061                 runHeight.Text.Trim().Equals("") || runWidth.Text.Trim().Equals("") ||
00062                 runQuantity.Text.Trim().Equals(""))
00063             {
00064                 notifyMsg.Text = "Some required fields are still empty.";
00065                 notifyMsg.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
00066                 notifyMsg.Visible = true;
00067 
00068                 return false;
00069             }
00070 
00071             int result;
00072             if (!Int32.TryParse(runQuantity.Text.Trim(), out result))
00073             {
00074                 notifyMsg.Text = "Quantity must be an integer value.";
00075                 notifyMsg.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
00076                 notifyMsg.Visible = true;
00077 
00078                 return false;
00079             }
00080             
00081             if (!Int32.TryParse(runHeight.Text.Trim(), out result) || !Int32.TryParse(runWidth.Text.Trim(), out result))
00082             {
00083                 notifyMsg.Text = "Dimensions must be integer values.";
00084                 notifyMsg.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
00085                 notifyMsg.Visible = true;
00086 
00087                 return false;
00088             }
00089 
00090             return true;
00091         }
00092     }
